==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|麻|笥}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=おけ}}. Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=おけ|麻|tr1=o|t1=flax, ramie|笥|tr2=ke|t2=a container, especially for foodstuffs or tableware}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おけ|hhira=をけ}}

# Alternative form of {{ja-def|桶}} a [[tub]], a [[bucket]], a [[basin]].

====Usage notes====
The {{l|ja|桶}} spelling is more common.
